00019 #ifndef GLUKJOBS_H
00020 #define GLUKJOBS_H
00021 
00022 #include <KJob>
00023 
00024 #include <ThreadWeaver/Job>
00025 #include <ThreadWeaver/Weaver>
00026 
00027 class GlukTreeModel;
00028 
00029 namespace GlukJobs
00030 {
00031 
00032 class Job : public KJob
00033 {
00034     Q_OBJECT
00035 
00036 friend class Thread;
00037 public:
00038     Job(QObject *parent = 0) : KJob(parent)
00039     {}
00040     virtual ~Job() {}
00041 
00042     void start();
00043 
00044 protected:
00045     virtual void doWork() = 0;
00046 
00047 signals:
00048     void completed();
00049 };
00050 
00051 class TreeFetchJob : public Job
00052 {
00053     Q_OBJECT
00054 public:
00055     TreeFetchJob(GlukTreeModel *model, QObject *parent = 0);
00056     ~TreeFetchJob();
00057 
00058     void doWork();
00059 
00060 private:
00061     GlukTreeModel *m_model;
00062 };
00063 
00064 class Thread : public ThreadWeaver::Job
00065 {
00066     Q_OBJECT
00067 public:
00068     Thread(GlukJobs::Job *);
00069     virtual ~Thread();
00070 
00071 private:
00072     void run();
00073 
00074     GlukJobs::Job *m_job;
00075 };
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif
